title: Textile, 1995-50-5-a,b, 1850–80
dimensions:
a. Warp: 315 cm [124"] Cut top and bottom. Weft: 107 cm [42"] Cut both sides.
b. Warp: 353 cm [139"] Cut top and bottom, two pieces seamed. Weft: 120 cm [47"] Cut both sides, one side shattered and frayed.
Pattern: Repeat length: 196 cm [77"].                                               Repeat width: 70.5 cm [27.75"].                                            Repeated twice across the width.
description: Yellow, large scale pattern with large flowers including daffodils.
